attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With London being one of the most expensive cities on the planet and a city under threat from climate change, it is economically untenable. Meanwhile, cities in the regions are at a competitive disadvantage whilst decision-making remains in London. The decision-making positions should be moved out of London and into Manchester, a city large enough to cope with these positions whilst remaining financially viable as an alternative location.
